website_summaries.verdict: This stylish lock box allows users to store personal values in places with minimal security, such as beaches, open houses and parks.
pros: Resists outdoor elements such as sun, sand and salt water
Allows users to store wallets, cash, phones and other valuables on site
Available in a variety of colors
cons: Interior dimensions smaller than expected, so there's limited storage space
Both key and combination locks can be faulty
On the heavy side for traveling

customer_reviews.title: Good Idea but poor security
customer_reviews.text: Good Idea but poor security. Basically took me 5 seconds to open this with a screwdriver needs to have some metal and not plastic around locking pin.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Rambo

customer_reviews.title: Great concept but poor quality material used for cable ends
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a recent trip to Hawaii. The safe itself is made of durable material. The number dial is a bit small but workable. The cable used to attach the safe to a fixture is just the right length and flexibility. The metal alloy used for the ends of the cable is such poor quality that after only one week of use during the trip, the cable ends are already rusty (see pics).
customer_reviews.author: DAC

customer_reviews.title: Not Water Resistant
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because it said it was water resistant. We were at the beach and we had a light rain. The box filled with water. I suspect the water enters where the security cable connects to the box. If you look closely where this connection is you can see inside the box. Water runs down the cable and into the box.
customer_reviews.author: MKE

customer_reviews.title: I had been waiting for months to use this on ...
customer_reviews.text: I had been waiting for months to use this on vacation. I accidentally dropped in the elevator at the hotel and the lock broke off. It was a small 4 foot drop with no velocity. So much for being secure and durable. I won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Torres family

customer_reviews.title: Broke at first use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in February for our summer cruise. Broke during first use. Ended up being a waste of space in my luggage.
customer_reviews.author: ET

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Just used it for the first time yesterday. I changed the code according to the instructions, double checked to make sure it worked before my vacation - and it wouldn’t open. Very disappointed. I don’t know if the jostling during travel did something, but it shouldn’t have.
customer_reviews.author: Wiseapple

customer_reviews.title: Good for securing phone and passport
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used it the combo lock worked fine. However the second time I used it at a beach resort to hold my passport in Costa Maya. I attached it to a table leg and when I went to open it, the lock would not open with my code. I panicked!!! After about 30 minutes of messing with it and entering my 3 digit code over and over I finally jiggled it open. So I suggest you take the key as backup. The safe was big enough to hold 4 passports and a phone. I am still glad I bought it but will take the key as backup next time!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla G

customer_reviews.title: The thing I liked best about this product is the fact that you ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this 4 stars only because they put keys and directions inside the safe and lock it so when you receive it there is no way you can get the safe opened. That being said , there is a number on the box that you can call and they will tell you how to open the safe. The thing I liked best about this product is the fact that you can call that number if you should ever lose your keys or forget your code, you get another set of keys.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs GM

customer_reviews.title: A must for peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: Looked at several options and reviews of locking systems. This has proven the reviews correct. Took us a few tries to realize it has to be secured and the top flat and then you change the code from open with your code to locked with a random code. So easy and helpful. My Kindle and iPhone (the most recent and biggest sized) fit along with some credit cards and accessories. Bought two for family of 4. Could have had 3 but we managed with the 2. If you have a taller item like the Kindle it has to be placed in the middle to close, as shown in the photos. But 5 stars for certain. Completely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Brit Steven

customer_reviews.title: Good at the Beach
customer_reviews.text: Solid product for use at the beach etc. I looped the cable through a couple of sun chairs and decided that was enough to deter the grab and run type of theif. I only kept some cash and a couple of phones in it. I don't think I would use it in place of a hotel safe or keep passports or other higher value items in it. It is plastic and thd hinges are on the outside. If someone wants in and is in an place out of view, they are going to get into it.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn N.

customer_reviews.title: We bought this for a cruise so we could put ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a cruise so we could put our cell phones in it. It worked however the phones overheated. We kept it in the shade but it still was hot inside. I would return it but it is past the 30 day return policy. Tried to get organized in advance. I guess that was a mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as you'd hope!
customer_reviews.text: This is really a nice little portable safe for use on the beach or around a pool. You can chain it to a chair, and not worry about things disappearing. Of course, it's not foolproof, especially if someone drags away the chair, or is walking around with bolt cutters! But it's much better than simply trying to hide your wallet and phone under the towel. It's also good for just stuffing into your backpack to keep way prying eyes and quick sticky fingers. It's small enough to carry around, yet big enough to hold a wallet, money clip, phone, powerbank, and so on. I particularly like that it uses BOTH a combination and key.
customer_reviews.author: M. Reno

customer_reviews.title: so I was happy it arrived fast
customer_reviews.text: Recieved item today, leaving for the beach in a couple days, so I was happy it arrived fast. Upon opening the package, item had considerable scratches on the front. I'm sure it won't effect the operation of the item, but for the price you'd expect it to not have what look to be scratches made by someone on purpose. Also what sucks is thAt because I'm going on vacation in a few days, I won't have time to return it and get a new one. So I guess I'm on the losing end. Don't buys this if you want it to look good when you get it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mccartney

customer_reviews.title: Too big and bulky, better with nothing.  Hey, folks take this with all my valuables!
customer_reviews.text: Large and cumbersome! Made nice but so big it says "take my valuables", they are here! Very disappointed that I did not realize the size before I purchase, I think it is too late to return, darn it! It takes up too much room in your suitcase when you are so limited on space traveling by air. Don't buy if you want to be discreet with your valuables.
customer_reviews.author: Dinah Schofer

customer_reviews.title: Too chunky!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to use on our cruise vacation. I loved the description and felt that it would be a good alternative to not using the cruise ship safe in the stateroom. I really like the concept and the ability to take it to a local beach, however, it's too chunky to pack and takes up too much room in your suitcase if you're going somewhere that you have to fly. It is big enough to hold 2 cell phones, sun glasses, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa Murray

customer_reviews.title: Fatal security flaw caused us to lose everything.
customer_reviews.text: I picked this box after looking at many others. BIG mistake. This box has a fatal security flaw and should NOT be trusted. Sure the plastic is hard to break and the box locks up, but due to a fatal flaw the metal combination can be easily pushed into the box, making the entire thing worthless. We lost $500 and everything in the box because when we walked away for 5 minutes. Extremely disappointed. If you want a deterrent it works fine, but if you want actual security then find something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Combinations wouldn’t set. Had to return 2 of 3.
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these and had to return 2 because they wouldn’t work. I was bummed. I really wanted to like them and I needed them for a trip.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn K

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind. Priceless
customer_reviews.text: We are taking 2 vacations this summer that involves pool so I decided to get this so that I can have my phone with me for entertainment while lounging by the pool. We've already used it pool side at the Mandalay Bay resort in Las Vegas. We'll take it with us to go to Maui (Grand Wailea Resort) next. It is easy to use and secure enough for our purposes. I'm sure someone can break into it if they had the proper tools, but who's gonna walk around the pool with a bolt cutter?
customer_reviews.author: C. Mansour

customer_reviews.title: Set the combination, never open again
customer_reviews.text: I loved the idea of this, but after we set the combination the first time, we could never get it open again. We tried a bunch of different combinations in case we'd made a mistake with the number, but nothing worked. Thank goodness for the key.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Moeller

customer_reviews.title: Combination doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item and no matter what I do I can’t get the combination changed. I have followed the instructions and it is almost impossible to move the little clip inside to change the combination and even when I did the box won’t open with the combination
customer_reviews.author: Junkyjam

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed, the code would never set
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed, the code would never set. I even called the company. A gentleman told me the guy who could help me was at a trade show and would call me back. He never did!
customer_reviews.author: A R

customer_reviews.title: Worked OKAY, not as well as expected
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for using at the beach on a cruise. It worked OKAY, not great. The "chain" is a little short, and if sand gets into the area where you put the code in (we didn't set it in the sand but it still got in there a little) the numbers stick. Honestly, it was kind of a pain in the butt to put in the code every time I needed to get into it. If the chain part was longer, I think that would help.
customer_reviews.author: Just Us

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I took this with me on vacation to the beach and it was so convenient. It's actually a bit larger than I thought it would be, but small enough to pack away in luggage with no problems. Whether attaching it to my beach chair or hanging it in the room, I felt like my stuff was secure. Easily held a couple of cell phones, keys, passport, money etc. The lock portion and keys functioned properly. I won't go on vacation without it now!
customer_reviews.author: Tanyito

customer_reviews.title: as someone could easily clip the tether with a simple pair of fence ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a Europe trip, so I'll update my review after we actually use it. So far, the plastic seems durable, but it's definitely not as hardy as I'd hoped, especially for the price. I'm sure this will work for minor theft deterrent, but I certainly wouldn't leave it somewhere vulnerable for any amount of time, as someone could easily clip the tether with a simple pair of fence or bolt cutters. It's also quite small: there's only room enough for two smart phones, or maybe a wallet or two. I'll see if it works for my Europe trip and will update this review if it works or if it doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Pico

customer_reviews.title: Great for the gym
customer_reviews.text: I work out at a gym without lockers. The owners tout their 24/7 camera monitoring system as all the security you need, but somehow that doesn't do it for me. I use this container to put my car keys, jewlery, and any other valuables in and then lash it to a big metal coat rack. It's fast and easy to use and I feel a lot more secure knowing that any creepers or theives can't take a trip to my car while I'm lifting or make off with my wedding set. I just keep the container in the shoe compartment of my gym bag. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Coburn-SchillTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Easy way to keep your belongings safe on vacation!
customer_reviews.text: I fill it up and leave the lid open in my suitcase (in case our luggage is ever searched, I don’t want a hard sided locked container in there delaying us!) so it takes up no additional space when we travel. It’s perfect for at the pool or on the beach - we fit four iphones, two room keys, money, hair ties, etc in there with ease, then attach it to our chair and don’t worry about our valuables being stolen or blowing away. I thread the strap through our beach bag as well so that doesn’t “walk”. Easy to set up the code and use.
customer_reviews.author: PointBeing

customer_reviews.title: Get product but falls a little short!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product concept, however combination feature does not work after resetting 0-0-0 combo default and there is no option to reset. Only key works to release lock which makes me weary of reliability. I followed instructions to change combo to a T. I even made sure numbers on combo were properly aligned before returning trigger to original position to establish my new lock code BUT new combination does not open lock. I even tried 0-0-0 and several combinations one off from my new number. This defeats the purpose of leaving ALL my valuables. I would still need to carry the key around - kinda a pain! So bummed.... I really wanted to LOVE this product!
customer_reviews.author: Gigi Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Beware of Lock basically setting itself with unknown combo!
customer_reviews.text: We are pretty disappointed in this product as the product locked on my daughter upon her checking it out. She never set the lock with her own numbers so she has no way of knowing what the” set” combo is. We wrote the company and were told that, if you don’t know the combo the lock is set to, you can not reset it to a number of your choosing. So my daughter is stuck only using the keys and that totally detracts from why we bought this lock. Not a happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Warrior Moms

customer_reviews.title: It's plastic and someone could certainly get in if they really really wanted to but this seems like a great deterrent and a very
customer_reviews.text: I haven't really used this yet but it's big enough for an iPhone and wallet with plenty of room for other small items but seems to be portable enough to not be too cumbersome. It's plastic and someone could certainly get in if they really really wanted to but this seems like a great deterrent and a very good product. Despite being plastic, it seems to be on the sturdier side. I plan to use it on the beach in Hawaii. If I like it, I will upgrade my review to 5 stars. If it does not perform as I expect, I will downgrade my review. Finally, the cost seems fair for the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Fire_medic

customer_reviews.title: A must have ot secure you valuables at the beach/pool
customer_reviews.text: I got this through the amazon warehouse, so I paid a fraction of the price. Hands down a great product, I like having the option of both the key and combination. I can fit 2 cell phones, jewellery, ID's and cash with room to spare. It is a bit bulky to carry in a backpack or to check in luggage, but having the piece of mind far outweighs the little bit of inconvenience. Is it worth full price? I think so, I was leery that is why I waiting for a warehouse deal. With what I seen of it, I would be OK if I paid full price.
customer_reviews.author: Don Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Have Already Recommended to Family and Friends
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product for our vacation and it worked wonders. We were able to strap it around a couple pool chairs and lock it without worrying while we were swimming. It works the way it says it should and fit multiple phones and other items. I did order a BLACK box but somehow received a white, but traded with another family member (they ordered a black as they wanted my white so it was an easy trade). I would and have recommended this to family and friends already. Overall great product. I will note that the black box does get a bit hot if left in the sun but that's to be expected given the color.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: We took this on our recent vacation. How nice it was to be able to go swim out in the ocean without having to make sure no one was stealing our valuables. It served it's purpose well. That being said, if you are looking for a super indestructible item, with a cable to would be extremely difficult to cut through, this isn't it. For instance...if i locked up my bike and had this attached to it, I feel someone could cut the cable...but it is a deternet, and places like the beach etc, thieves are looking for stuff they can grab quick and walk away. I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Maam777

customer_reviews.title: Worked great on our cruise instead of the room safe!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on our cruise! (Had a good friend have a nightmare of things getting stolen out of their room safe), so locked our passports in this, and then locked it in our luggage. Obviously if someone wants to bust it, you could definitely get in it if you tried hard enough, but the whole point is to make it a deterrent - it would take a bunch of time to get in the luggage, then get in this thing without making a ton of noise. Problem solved. Would buy again or recommend for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: D.D.

customer_reviews.title: Fingerprints smeared all over purse, dented backside
customer_reviews.text: Item was dented on backside. Also, it was obviously handled, smeared with handprints. I think I was sold a previously owned bag I paid full price for NEW item. I do not want USED. I am refunding I bought one a week ago, different color, brand NEW, no problems. The item was presented and sold a NEW, not USED. Uggggh. Waste of my time and money for hassle. Also, color is darker and dull compared to advertising picture. Ugggh
customer_reviews.author: DiDi

customer_reviews.title: Locked out, sort of
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions, & set the pin to the 1st one. Worked great. Go to set the pin on the 2nd one, & it won't work. Only works with the key. I used the same pin on both of the lockers, so it's not the pin # that's the problem. So now I am stuck debating on sending them back, or keep a defective one that will annoy me every time I go to use it. EDIT: I cracked the code to this in less than a hour. Not really secure. :(
customer_reviews.author: Denise506

customer_reviews.title: A must have for cruise or water/amusement park....money saver!
customer_reviews.text: If you go anywhere you can leave your bag unattended this is an absolute must have! It is super easy to use and holds 2 iphones, credit cards, id's, passports, keys! It is not waterproof but it is water resistant. You can loop it around a chair/table and lock it and nobody is going to walk away with it. We purchases for a cruise but before that trip came we have been using it at our local water park and it is great. I no longer need to spend $10 to rent a locker each time.
customer_reviews.author: KEVIN JENKINS

customer_reviews.title: Maybe worth $10.00. Incredibly cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Very, very cheaply made. Just cheap plastic. You could use a butter knife to pop the lid off easily. Of course the hinges are junk. For forty dollars, I am returning it. I see nothing on this item that validates the $40 price tag. I may of kept it for $12.00 or so. Its just cheap plastic. Also, it is not water proof. The cable that runs through the lid runs into the container. Thus there is a huge hole in the lid. How is that waterproof??
customer_reviews.author: bahhhoo

customer_reviews.title: Works great for what I needed it for
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small lock box that I could leave the clicker for my front gate in for when the gardner came by and I was not home. this works perfectly. I am not sure how waterproof it is, but that is not a big deal for me. the combination was easy to set and the cable lock secures to around a fence post. It has enough room to keep many things and should work well anywhere you need to lock things down but if someone REALLY wanted to get into it it would not be too hard. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ross W

customer_reviews.title: Great for the house
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this mostly for the house. I have a safe but wanted something closer for my better jewelry that I wear often and a little cash for close access. It’s not unbreakable but secure when a cleaner if person or handyman is around. Use it a lot. Probably would not take on vacation but never know.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared and bring your own safe
customer_reviews.text: We learned several weeks ahead of a trip to Punta Cana that many larcenies were occurring at our resort. 150 employees were fired but the larcenies continued . We used the two Safego safes to place our valuables and cash into. We then attached them to the 4 by 4 bedposts. We placed nothing into the hotel safes. We have no losses on our trip and sent a clear message to the resort staff who may have entered our room that we were not to be messed with. We were fighting back. There were at least two larcenies that occurred during our stay. Not us, we were prepared.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Replacement Keys - Excellent Service!
customer_reviews.text: I love using this, whether for travel or going to the park with my nephews. Easily locks on a beach chair, fence, bleachers; pretty much anywhere. I’ve had it for a few years now. But, their customer service is amazing. My keys got locked IN the Safego, and I couldn’t remember a combination (or if I ever set one). I contacted them via their website, and within a few hours they replied and told me they can send a new set of keys! Thanks Zach & Safego!
customer_reviews.author: Denise De Marco

customer_reviews.title: worked well
customer_reviews.text: We went to the Bahamas, and I was concerned about our passports and other things of value. It made me feel better knowing I had the SAFEGO safe. It was large enough to fit all the things we needed to as well as a couple of phones. We ordered the white. It looked good. I didn't know if it was a white coating or what, but it was white through and through. I am going to use it for future out-of-town ventures as well as use it on outings here at home, as well. It wasn't heavy, so I wasn't worried about it weighing down my suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Bradford

customer_reviews.title: A must have for travel
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these and glad I did. I gave one to my friend for our trip. They are a little smaller then i though, held my cell, passport and ID. On the beach we locked them on our beach chairs to hold or seats while we swam and ate. The key option was great too, when I loaned mine to a second friend she used the key and didn't have to remember the code. I'll definately make sure I take it on any solo trips. I can lock it to the chair and feel more comfortable my items will be there when I return after short periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: LayDeLeon

customer_reviews.title: functional
customer_reviews.text: this safe is pretty roomy it can hold your phone, wallet, keys and a bit more i bought this to use at the beach. if you use this while you are relatively close by, it is excellent i attach it to my beach chair to safeguard my phone and keys while i am in the water with my kid, i figure even in new york a thief can't run off with the whole chair! it can also be easily attached to a car's frame inside the trunk i would not leave valuables in it where someone would have completely unobserved access to it for a long period of time
customer_reviews.author: siggy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this thing! We go to a lot of water parks and now I don't worry about leaving things back at my towel. I also use it outside our camper when we leave our site. That way I don't have to carry my keys with me. If I had no pick anything to critique, it would be that it's sometimes hard to lock. It may be the sunscreen on my hands or sand I got in the lock, but sometimes I just can't get it to snap the lock in for a few minutes. Other than that, it's perfect for my cellphone, cash, keys, etc
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Colchado

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Wife and I purchased this to use on a cruise when we went out on excursions. Not a ton room inside, but large enough for a couple of wallets and a couple of cell phones. We have since used it at hotels, water parks and beaches.
customer_reviews.author: 1hubbarda

customer_reviews.title: Safego is a WIN
customer_reviews.text: This thing is perfect! I purchased this prior to my trip to the the Caribbean, and I'm glad I did. It fit both my wife and I's smartphones, wallets and passports no problem. Weave it around your chair or a fixed object and your good to go. The key combo works separate from the key so you can use either one to open the case. I mainly used this in my hotel room though, under the bed attached to the frame. It worked excellent for that. Just nice peace of mind. I highly recommend this. I'd love to see smaller and larger models so I can review those as well!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: A must have for cruise/beach
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on a suggestion from a website for a cruise we are going on. Love this!! Good quality and easy to change the passcode. Tough and durable and fits a large phones (iPhone 7plus and a Galexy S7) and has room for a few other things!!! Will be able to not worry about our stuff going missing since we will be on a beach we can clip to our beach chairs and know that our stuff will not be going anywhere. Also has enough room on the clip to add a bag strap so that our bag will also stay put!
customer_reviews.author: Jen M.

customer_reviews.title: Very handy and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Recently used this on a trip to Jamaica. The safe in my hotel room was broken so I stored everything including cash, camera and phone in my Safego safe and attached it to the bar in the closet. It had plenty of room and was very easy to use. The next week I used it on a cruise and was able to take it on deck with me to lock up my stuff while I was in the pool. It would not hold a tablet but for the things I needed with me it was great.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our trip to Mexico. We've been there at least 10 times but we were staying at the Breathless Resort (highly recommend!) and we wanted to lock our stuff up because there were a few pools to go too. We used the lock on our chair so we could go to the party pool for a little bit then come back to our seat. The lock was easy to set and very easy to use. So many people were asking us where we got it from. Definitely worth the price. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: teriboll

customer_reviews.title: It’s a plastic travel safe, it will keep your meds safe from little kids.
customer_reviews.text: It keeps kids from getting at dangerous medication, while on vacation. It is made out of plastic, so not secure if an adult wants what’s in it in private, could be smashed open easily. Secure if people are around it to make sure nobody hits it with a hammer or something! The locking cable etc. would be secure, but the container easily destroyed... It did exactly what I needed it for...
customer_reviews.author: Thomas McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: refer below
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and another competitor product.the latter was a breeze to set up .this one ,been trying for more than 30 mins ,i couldn't get it to work.Lever will not turn to the left,only to the right .piece of rubbish!
customer_reviews.author: Alex S

customer_reviews.title: Worked like advertised
customer_reviews.text: We were able to easily set up the combination and utilize the safe in two of our ports-of-call. It kept our phones and money safe and took away the worry. Need to be sure to attach to a secure chair that would not be moved. Product works as advertised and designed. Fit 2 phones, headphones, money and credit cards.
customer_reviews.author: Aud2013

customer_reviews.title: Safego is a wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to take with me to indoor waterparks, beaches etc. I always worried about leaving my things on my chair covered with a towel. Not anymore, this product stopped my worrying. I put my things inside locked it to the table and I knew no-one was going to get to it. Every sturdy and you can unlock it with the combination lock or a key. I highly recommend this product to everyone who wants to keep their things safe.
customer_reviews.author: connie gorgas

customer_reviews.title: What's important is a safe bigger than this toy box👎👎
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it would be neat for my grandkids but honestly I couldn't fit nothing but my phone an my cigs just not what I was hoping for so thumbs down for me 👎👎👎👎
customer_reviews.author: Kellylove,

customer_reviews.title: Great personal travel locker/safe
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this safe for when I go on cruises, to amusement parks, water parks, etc to be able to lock up my personal belongings like my phone, car keys, small wallet and external battery. It comes in very handy and it has saved me a ton of locker rental fees. I was disappointed when I first received it because I was sent the wrong color; however Amazon made everything ok and I decided to keep the green one since it does what I bought it to do. It's a little tricky at first on setting your code and when turning the knob to unlock the safe.
customer_reviews.author: VaRonica

customer_reviews.title: This is AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: This little purse safe is perfect! I wanted something to hold my stuff securely while on vacation at the beach or in the hotel room to protect valuables! The size is perfect and its cute! I can lock the strap right around a chair or umbrella. I can carry it like a purse if I want to. It is exactly as pictured! The best part was the personal note to confirm I'm happy with the product! I will purchase products from companies like this that actually appreciate the customer. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo Dmytro

customer_reviews.title: I AM SO GLAD I FOUND THIS!
customer_reviews.text: This a just great! We took this on a cruise and it was fabulous for our piece of mind! It fit our passports, jewelry, travel docs and money without a problem. We could have added one phone with its case or 2 phones out of their cases if needed. Small medication bottles could also have fit. While in the suitcases in transit, the bulk was off-set by stuffing small items like toiletries and sundries inside-and as a bonus the hard shell protected the bottles! This was everything I had been hoping for based on reviews and we will use this from now on in any type of travel situation!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this before a trip to the beach to try it out before taking it on a cruise in December. It does exactly what it says it does. I realize if someone is determined to steal my belongings, they will, but this at least doesn't make me the easiest target at the beach. I do wish that this could be made with a soft-sided case though, as it is going to take a lot of room up in my luggage and I am flying for my next trip, so that is something to consider for those who are limited on luggage space.
customer_reviews.author: V. Price

customer_reviews.title: Very hit or miss
customer_reviews.text: The product seems fine. Like some other people, the code that set didn’t work. I followed the directions exactly, but it wouldn’t set AND I couldn’t use the preset code. I can only use the key to open the safe. I have called and emailed the company without any response.
customer_reviews.author: APscholar1588

customer_reviews.title: pretty secure, and just pretty, too
customer_reviews.text: After looking through several options, decided to get the Safego. I think it is the prettiest option out there by far! And it's pretty secure for those times I'm at the pool, or at a resort, or cruise, or even a party with lots of people I don't know. I'd actually prefer an option without the combination lock since a determined (or lucky) stranger could try all the combinations if they had a little bit of time. Nevertheless, it's a great theft deterrent and that's probably all it needs to be. My sisters like it so much, they each want one too...they'll get them as early Christmas presents so they can use them this summer!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Y. Yang

customer_reviews.title: Handy and secure!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this after seeing a similar product on a morning news show. We were headed to Atlantis Bahamas. We locked 3 phones, wallet, and my glasses in here then secured to the beach chair. This probably won't stop a seasoned thief but it will slow then down enough to draw attention to themselves. I felt safe using it and am very glad I made the purchase. It does take up space in the daypack though!
customer_reviews.author: DaneDame

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my safego for a recent cruise and was very happy with it. It is lightweight and small enough to fit easily in a tote bag or small backpack but large enough to hold my 7plus iPhone, binoculars, and money/cards. It was very easy to attach to beach chairs, picnic tables, and railings thereby enabling our entire party (we each had a safego) to be in the water at the same time while feeling confident our belongings were safe on the beach. Safego was defined worth the money and I will take it on all my future trips to beach or anyplace else I need to keep my belongings safe while on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Mari Sol

customer_reviews.title: Great safe for our RV
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made item that allows us to lock up and leave extra cash and items in our RV while we are gone. Much larger than I thought it would be. Even seeing the pictures did not give me a good idea of the size. I think this is a great product for anyone that needs some security for items when not at home. No comment on the water resistance of this product as we have not used it except in a dry environment.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Burt Green

customer_reviews.title: For looks
customer_reviews.text: I mean, this is cute for looks and maybe a few trips to the beach. Other than that, I don't understand why $40.00 is being charged for a complete plastic and extremely light safe? I bought this for my curtain rod inside my closet - but it's just too small and flimsy (approx 6in deep). Also; it's water resistant, NOT waterproof. Not worth $40 by any means.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy STop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Was Okay
customer_reviews.text: I used this lock box for one time and found that it was a bit cumbersome for me to use. I looped it over the rungs under my beach umbrella and put my cell phone and money in it. It hung too low for me and was fairly visible for anyone passing by my umbrella. Kind of an invitation for someone curious to see what was inside. It just wasn't for me, so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Jane W.

customer_reviews.title: A bust
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived but I could not unlock it without a set of pliers. Once I got it opened and read the instructions on how to change the code, the proper equipment to change the code was not inside the item. I'm very disappointed as I was hoping that my study-abroad student could use this. But they will be traveling abroad without it! I will be returning the item and hope to get some resolution from the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a vacation where we wanted extra security for items. We haven't used it yet but have tried it at home a few times and like the way it works. It is a little difficult to pull the cable out enough to fasten around an non movable piece like a railing. We haven't tried the combination yet but plan on doing it as soon as we figure out a memorable number.
customer_reviews.author: baker queen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! If you vacation to a beach or pool you MUST have one of these. This kept me from having to rent a locker on my latest trip to Volcano Bay Orlando. I was able to fit my cell and my daughters cell among other things but its best if e each individual has their own. I felt very secure locking this to a beach chair and going about my business with no worry about anything in it.
customer_reviews.author: Teressa

customer_reviews.title: Secure and Roomy
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the portable lock box safe. I was surprised at the capacity for safely stowing my "stuff." It was easy to reset the combination lock to a code I can remember. The lock box itself is made of thick, study plastic so it is light but strong. The locking mechanism with the lanyard allows the lock box to be attached securely to a sturdy post if you choose. I also like the idea that I can use it as a handle to carry the lock box. Great portable security for your personal items.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to lock to bleachers
customer_reviews.text: Our local pool closed their locker rooms during COVID-19, and I needed a way to safely store my car keys and phone while exercising. This has been a great solution. I lock it to the bleachers at the pool and have had no issues so far. It's easy to lock, secure, and I can swim in peace knowing that my belongings are safe.
customer_reviews.author: C. Smitley

customer_reviews.title: Water Park Must Have
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. We go to the water park 2-3 times a month and spend $10-15 on a locker each time. Decided to try this out and we wonder why didn't we do this sooner. We just attached it to the beach chair and kept it with our towels and stuff. We were able to fit our money, car keys, and 2 cell phones (iPhone Plus/Max size) in there no problem. Also made life easier because the location of the beach chairs was way more convenient than the lockers were. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Andals

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but starting to rust
customer_reviews.text: I use this outside. I’ve had it for 2 months now. It is easy to use, roomy and convenient. I have. just noticed, though, that the silver key knob has started to rust....this should not be happening...manufacturers please take note ! I bought it to use outside so it should be rustproof.
customer_reviews.author: DonaQuijote

customer_reviews.title: Great money saver
customer_reviews.text: It feels really good to know I’m never going to throw money at a water park for a locker ever again. This thing is awesome! Locks securely and easily and is incredibly convenient. Loving taking this to the beach. I’m always worrying about someone stealing my keys or phone while I’m in the ocean. Those fears have evaporated when I bring my portable lockbox!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua C.

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 2 teenage sons for Christmas. The older one thought it might be handy for college to keep things safer in his room. I had hoped the younger one would use it on his bike and at the pool, but he said that it was too big and noticeable,but he didn't object to me taking it along if I went too. I think they will find more uses for them than they think, they just haven't had the chance to use them yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amy G.

customer_reviews.title: Took away one star because of security code failure...
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: OK SO... I have not used this since my cruise, and I do not remember my code unfortunately. I do have my keys however I cannot put in a new code and less I remember my old code (I can think of very few reasons to put in a new code if you remember your old code). so be aware that although this item is very unique and handy, if you forget your code you will never be able to use the code again. Hopefully they will update this feature and allow the law code to be changed if you have the key. Love this. took on cruise.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: SAFEGO Portable Indoor/Outdoor Lock Box Safe
customer_reviews.text: Does the job ~ heavy duty and secure. I haven't tried to crush it or cut the cable, but when the cable is looped and locked around the cast iron legs of my printer stand or something similarly large heavy ~ unless the thief is going to take that also.. this isn't going anywhere. For my purposes this was a good option to secure small valuables; cash, credit cards etc within my home office.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Moore

customer_reviews.title: OH, YOU NEED THIS!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it. Great idea, great design, great great great. I purchased 2 for a trip to a resort. I got the pink one and the gold one. Both are gorgeous. I'm thinking about getting the blue one too, to keep in my jeep. So in addition to using it at the resort, since I've come home I've used it on my bicycle and in my jeep wrangler when the top is off, there are so many possibilities. And ladies, when you carry it around by the cord, people think its actually a cool purse!! Everyone needs one of these!! LOVE, LOVE, LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: CC Mark

customer_reviews.title: Yes! Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our cruise and will be using it for years to come especially on other cruises and beach trips etc. We were able to put our passports, money, etc in this and locked it to a beach chair while we swam in the ocean. No worries- it was there when we returned. We just used the combination lock. Great sturdy product! Glad we bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Darren or Denise J

customer_reviews.title: Locks down valuables so that you can let loose and play!
customer_reviews.text: We went on a girls trip out of the country. This was used daily pool side and nightly in our hotel room so that we could lock up electronics that were not able to fit in the safe. This allowed us to go down to the water together, lazy river and not having one person staying back with our belongings. Game changer!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Temporary Safe
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to set up and very secure for use on the beach or at the pool. Cable is long enough to fasten across two chairs and prevent anyone from swiping it easily. It also comes with a key in case you forget the combination. Hard shell and water resistant. Was able to fit two android phones, a wallet, sunglasses, and car keys with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Alien Evolution

customer_reviews.title: I love this little portable safe
customer_reviews.text: I love this little portable safe. It is easy to use and has both a key or combination option. While I don't think ti will do more than keep the honest honest, it is great for keeping things away from young children, or securing your valuables in situations where you might be distracted. Great for the pool, spa, gym, golf cart, hotel or outdoors. I think anyone with a few minutes, a heavy object and a desire to break in could do so, but it is a perfect deterrent. Great for a quick and easy way to lock up medications, etc. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Vdub

customer_reviews.title: Great Graduation Gift
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd year in a row I bought these mini safes as high school graduation gifts for kids. They are perfect for a dorm room. My daughter uses one and loops it around her closet bar at school. Great way to store cash and medicine safely in the dorm.
customer_reviews.author: Hiipakka

customer_reviews.title: Safe and Secure
customer_reviews.text: I recently traveled to Mexico with my daughter's. I purchased this SafeGo safe to take along with us. It was amazing. I used the portable safe to store our passports, wallets and iPhone. I secured the safe in our closet...As the famous cliche goes, out of sight out of mind.... I felt safe and confident that our valuables were secure. Directions provided were very easy to follow. We were able to set our code without difficulties. This product is sturdy and well made. My only regret is that I'd selected the color white. 😐 My family and I will definitely use this while away on vacation as well ad when we are here locally at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Starr

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this before my family's trip to Florida. In the past, I was always nervous about leaving our phones, keys, money etc by the pool or beach chairs. When in the ocean I was always scanning for our chairs to make sure our things were safe. This year I thoroughly enjoyed the ocean knowing my phone and money were safe. It was quick and easy to use. It can be attached to several surfaces. I would definitely recommend to anyone who frequently goes to pools, beaches or on cruises. It is peace of mind so fun can be had. Not too bulky, if you fill the safe and incorporate it into your packing. Great product. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: BGmama

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea!
customer_reviews.text: When I saw these advertised, I had to have one for traveling. I realize that nothing is 100% safe, but it's extra piece of mind for the basic items I need for the beach/pool. Sadly I haven't had the chance to use it yet, but tested it out at home with all the stuff I'd normally put in, everything fits great, & I can use it like a little purse almost. I got black, though was tough to pick a color as they are all nice. Wish I'd had one of these years ago.
customer_reviews.author: M.A.R.

customer_reviews.title: SAFEGO Portable Indoor/Outdoor Lock Box
customer_reviews.text: The size is perfect. Your product is easy to use. I bought it for my mother who is in an assisted living facility and she locks her meds and valuables in there when she leaves the room. Your product came on time, in perfect condition and as advertised. Excellent quality. It was recommended to me and I will recommend to others. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Glass Girl

customer_reviews.title: Glad I have it!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had known about this product years ago. I took it with me to a water park - and had peace of mind knowing no unsavory characters would snatch my wallet/keys/phone while my family and I enjoyed swimming. I wrapped the cable around something that's not "movable" - like a cement pole or two lounge chairs locked together with this safe. I found the instructions to be easy -- took me less than 1 minute to 'set' the lock.
customer_reviews.author: Pop Chips

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I took this with me to a beach in Mexico and had no problems. It holds a lot and allows you to relax in the water without worrying about your stuff. Buy the white one as it will not get as hot inside as a darker color. And keep it covered with a towel so it will stay even cooler and be less tempting to thieves.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for vacationing
customer_reviews.text: We took this on vacation with us to a resort and locked it to our pool chair when we left our area to eat lunch or ride water slides. It's a perfect solution for when you want items closer to you than the locker room area. The safe in our room malfunctioned and we were also able to lock our passports and cash in this safe until it was fixed. (Although it was larger than I expected, it is very lightweight.)
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Should have more digits for the combo
customer_reviews.text: Not that good, since it only has a 3 combo lock it got broken into pretty quickly..
customer_reviews.author: Molly Renteria

customer_reviews.title: All my friends want one too!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I like to go to the beach alone but never knew how to secure my valuables. This is brilliant. I recently brought this on a trip to the Caribbean with friends and realized I didn’t have a proper handbag with me, so I used this and it was a huge hit. All my friends want one now. It fits money, credit cards, my iPhone 6+, sunglasses easily and I strapped it to a chair through dinner and dancing with extra peace of mind! It’s actually pretty cute as a purse and being made of super hard plastic, doubles as a handy self defense tool! ;)
customer_reviews.author: KO

customer_reviews.title: Great little safe!  Perfect for the pool or beach!
customer_reviews.text: I love this safe! I bought it to take to a beach trip to Hawaii. It worked perfectly! I could keep my valuables locked up while soaking up the sun and still keep them near me. I also locked up my jewelry and iPhone charger in the safe and put it in my suitcase. I had stuff stolen from my suitcase before. The safe saved the day! It will always travel with me! It is well made and easy to use. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Liz Nau

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best purchases I have made in a long time
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best purchases I have made in a long time! I purchased it for the Disney waterparks, and it worked like a charm. It was large enough to store 2 iPhones, a wallet and car keys easily. I linked the cord through our pool bag and around a lounge chair. We are also members of a local waterpark, so I have now used it there as well. I can't express how much I love this item! I can't wait to use it at the beach as well.
customer_reviews.author: S. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect vacation safe
customer_reviews.text: I bought this prior to going on our first cruise because I had read about it on several cruising blogs. It worked perfectly for our phones and sea passes while swimming... we even laced our flip flops through the strap prior to securing the safe to the lounge chair to keep them from blowing away on the windy ship deck! On beach days, it kept the sand off our phones at the beach. It was exactly what I was looking for and I foresee using it quite a bit in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of having people stealing things out of my bag at the pool so decided to try this. It is easy to loop through the table or chair and cover with towels. I didn't want to draw attention to it either. It locks well and is easy to use. I feel like it's a simple deterrant when you are at something like a pool or waterpark where you are at your table off and on but don't want to take your phone with you everywhere you go. So far it works as advertised. A little expensive but was worth it to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item! Worked like a gem. We were able to leave our items on the beach chair and swim in the pool. Not only did it keep our keys and wallet safe from theft but it also indicated that the chair was taken. It's bigger than I expected. It held two wallets and two passports plus room keys and a small camera. The double access style made it easy if we accidentally locked the key to open it, inside. Super product!! Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: USA Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great for dorms
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son’s dorm. The strap lets him hang it around his closet bar so it can’t leave the room. Inside he can fit his passport, money, football tickets, and iPhone. Great purchase! Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Michigan Mom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, sturdy and fair price!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size safe for us to use at the waterpark to keep 2 phones, keys, passes, money, chapstick, etc. It allows us to enjoy playing at the waterpark and not worry about our valuables. It is made of good sturdy plastic and the wire that clasps onto the chair, or other thing, seems strong. It's nice to have a key pad or key, whichever way is easiest at the moment. We've already recommended it several times and will keep doing so! Very pleased with our purchase and the price was very fair!
customer_reviews.author: C. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for what I need it for
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice! I am ordering more. Yes, if someone cut the cable and ran off with it, it can be opened. However, I keep it at home with medications in it, and serves this purpose well! I would feel comfortable taking it on a hike, to the beach, the pool, etc.
customer_reviews.author: spazz

product_meta.title: SAFEGO Portable Indoor/Outdoor Lock Box Safe with Key and Combination Access (White)
feature_bullets: Indoor and outdoor lock box safe with 3-digit custom combination code + key access
Heavy-duty flexible steel cable to securely lock around almost any fixed object
Lightweight abs plastic is extremely durable, impact-resistant, and water-resistant

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars2,162 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
